message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more upfront since the inflation hits me harder.
Your share is impacted by inflation more, let's be realistic.  I'll take a little less to end this quickly.
Okay Bob, let's meet in the middle. This offer is better for both of us than the last round.
This is getting ridiculous. We both lose out if we keep going. A 50/50 split is the only fair option.
Bob, a 50/50 split doesn't reflect the fact that I'm losing money faster. This is my final offer.
